original_text:
Cubes
Alzi la mano chi almeno una volta nella vita non ha provato a risolvere il cubo di Rubik. Se non sapete di cosa stiamo parlando, si tratta di un’invenzione che un professore ungherese, Rubik appunto, creò nel 1974. Le sei facce del cubo hanno colori diversi e sono suddivise in quadranti che possono ruotare grazie a un meccanismo interno. Per giocare basta far girare le facce così da mischiare i quadranti e poi tentare di ricomporre lo stato iniziale, ossia una faccia = un colore.
Cubes ha una grafica abbastanza minimale, con uno sfondo fatto di tanti cubi tendenti al grigio e al centro una delle facciate del cubo. Quando si fa partire lo Spin, tutti i quadranti tridimensionali si staccano e ruotano, riatterrando con un colore differente. Qualche buona animazione segue le combinazioni vincenti e le grandi vincite. Per quel che riguardo il comparto musicale, i suoni sono un mix di  effetti elettronici che comunque possono essere disattivati in ogni momento.
Caratteristiche della slot
Si vince associando 5 o più simboli adiacenti in ogni punto della griglia. Di base la griglia è una 5×5, anche se ogni vincita comporta l’espansione di rulli e righe. Una prima combinazione vincente determina una griglia 7×7, poi 9×9 e infine 11×11. A ogni espansione è associata naturalmente l’aggiunta di colori che possono dar vita a nuove combinazioni. La griglia torna normale dopo ogni aggiunta non vincente. Le vincite vengono pagate dopo l’ultima espansione.
Il premio massimo è di 3.000 volte la puntata, la quale parte da un minimo di 0,20 € a un massimo di 100 €.
Dalle impostazioni si possono attivare giri automatici, funzione turbo, aprire la tabella dei pagamenti e disattivare la musica.
Cubes ha una volatilità media, ciò vuol dire che il rapporto tra frequenza di vincite e importi vinti è ben bilanciata. Il valore RTP è del 96,35%.
Simboli e funzionalità
Abbiamo cinque diversi colori e si vince con un minimo di 5 simboli sino a +25. I colori che valgono meno sono azzurro, viola e celeste, mentre pagano meglio il rosso, il giallo e il verde.
Vediamo ora le funzioni speciali che sono ben 3:

Moltiplicatore centrale: Ogni Spin ha un moltiplicatore centrale variabile sino a un massimo di x22, ciò vuol dire che se un cluster dello stesso colore passa dal centro, allora l’intera vincita verrà moltiplicata.
Giri Gratis: Per ottenere dei Free Spins è necessario che sulla griglia ci siano cinque gruppi di colori diversi. In questo caso si viene ricompensati con un massimo di 10 giri gratuiti e viene assegnato un colore casuale che resterà bloccato durante gli spin successivi. Nella funzione bonus la griglia non diminuisce di dimensione.
Color Blast: se si ottiene un gruppo di 70 cubi dello stesso colore durante i Giri Gratis, allora verrà pagato un premio pari a 2.500 volte la puntata.

Opinioni su Cubes:
La slot della Hacksaw Gaming ci è sembrata davvero ben fatta. Gli spin non hanno mai causato rallentamenti improvvisi o interruzioni del gioco, nonostante il pc da noi usato sia abbastanza datato. Per chi come noi ama i giochi cluster, Cubes può essere un buon prodotto con cui passare momenti piacevoli. La volatilità media ci sembra un buon compromesso, si vince con una buona frequenza e si possono ricevere importi per nulla indifferenti. La grafica non è eccelsa, ma visto il tema del gioco, probabilmente troppi colori o animazioni ci avrebbero soltanto disturbato.

Domande Frequenti 
Posso giocare a Cubes dal mio dispositivo mobile?

Questo è esattamente ciò per cui il gioco è stato ottimizzato! Hacksaw Gaming ha creato una serie di giochi di slot che sono più adatti per giocare su dispositivi mobili. Tutto ciò di cui hai bisogno è una connessione Internet stabile e un dispositivo compatibile.



Quali caratteristiche della slot Cubes aumentano le vincite?

Concentrati sulla funzione Color Blast, che è stata configurata per aumentare le tue vincite e realizzare combinazioni molto redditizie.



Quante linee di pagamento ci sono in Cubes?

Il gioco non ha le tradizionali payline; è stato sviluppato un formato cluster-win in un cubo 5x5, che può aumentare fino a 11x11. Prova anche Cubes 2, per partite ancora più “cervellotiche”!

raw_translation.response:
Attention all experienced gamblers, allow me to present to you the slot game "Cubes". Have you ever attempted to solve the Rubik's Cube? For those of you who aren't familiar with it, it's an invention created by a Hungarian professor named Rubik back in 1974. The cube consists of six sides with different colors, each side divided into quadrants that can rotate thanks to an internal mechanism. To play, simply rotate the faces to mix up the quadrants and then attempt to restore the initial state - one face equals one color. 

The graphics of Cubes are fairly minimalistic with a background consisting of a sea of gray cubes and the cube itself in the center. When you spin, all three-dimensional quadrants detach and rotate, ultimately landing with a different color. The game features some great animations that accompany winning combinations and big payouts. As for the music, it's a mix of electronic effects that can be turned off at any time.

You win by aligning 5 or more adjacent symbols anywhere on the grid. The base grid is 5x5, but every winning combination triggers an expansion of reels and rows. The first winning combination triggers a 7x7 grid, then a 9x9 and finally an 11x11 grid. Every expansion includes the addition of new colors that can generate new combinations. The grid returns to normal after each unsuccessful expansion and payouts are distributed after the final expansion. 

The maximum prize is 3,000 times the bet, which starts at a minimum of €0.20 and a maximum of €100. You can activate automatic spins, turbo mode, access the paytable, and turn off the music in the settings. Cubes is of medium volatility, meaning the ratio between winning frequency and amount won is well-balanced. The RTP value is 96.35%.

There are five different colors, and you win with a minimum of 5 symbols, up to +25. The lower-value colors are blue, purple, and light blue, while red, yellow, and green pay the most. There are three special features:

1. Central Multiplier: Each spin has a variable central multiplier of up to x22. If a cluster of the same color passes through the center, the entire payout is multiplied.

2. Free Spins: To activate free spins, you need five groups of different colors on the grid. You will receive up to 10 free spins, and a random color will remain locked during the following spins. The grid size doesn't decrease in the bonus feature.

3. Color Blast: If you obtain a group of 70 cubes of the same color during the Free Spins feature, you get a prize equal to 2,500 times the bet.

Overall, Cubes by Hacksaw Gaming is a well-made slot game. Spins are smooth and don't cause any interruptions or glitches, even on older devices. For those who enjoy cluster games, Cubes is a great product that provides pleasant moments. The medium volatility seems like a good compromise, with decent winning frequency and potential payouts. The graphics may not be outstanding, but too many colors or animations would have been disruptive to the game's theme.

Finally, for those who are wondering, Cubes is optimized for mobile devices, and there are no traditional paylines, only a cluster-win format in a 5x5 cube that can expand up to 11x11. Give Cubes 2 a try for an even more challenging experience!

Cubes

Raise your hand if you've ever tried to solve a Rubik's Cube at least once in your life. If you don't know what we're talking about, it's an invention that a Hungarian professor, Rubik, created in 1974. The six faces of the cube have different colors and are divided into squares that can rotate thanks to an internal mechanism. To play, you just need to turn the faces to mix up the squares and then try to restore the initial state, that is, one face = one color.

Cubes has a fairly minimalistic graphics, with a background made up of many cubes tending towards gray and in the center one of the faces of the cube. When you start the Spin, all the three-dimensional squares detach and rotate, landing with a different color. Some good animations follow the winning combinations and big wins. As for the musical component, the sounds are a mix of electronic effects that can be turned off at any time.

Slot Features

You win by associating 5 or more adjacent symbols in any point of the grid. The basic grid is 5x5, although each win involves the expansion of reels and rows. A first winning combination determines a 7x7 grid, then 9x9 and finally 11x11. With each expansion, of course, new colors are added that can give rise to new combinations. The grid returns to normal after each non-winning addition. Wins are paid after the last expansion.

The maximum prize is 3,000 times the bet, which starts from a minimum of 0.20 € to a maximum of 100 €. From the settings, you can activate automatic spins, turbo function, open the pay table and turn off the music.

Cubes has a medium volatility, meaning that the ratio between win frequency and amounts won is well balanced. The RTP value is 96.35%.

Symbols and Features

We have five different colors and win with a minimum of 5 symbols up to +25. The colors that are worth less are blue, purple, and light blue, while red, yellow, and green pay better.

Now let's look at the three special functions:

Central Multiplier: Each Spin has a variable central multiplier up to a maximum of x22, which means that if a cluster of the same color passes through the center, the entire win will be multiplied.

Free Spins: To get Free Spins, there must be five groups of different colors on the grid. In this case, you are rewarded with a maximum of 10 free spins and a random color is assigned that will remain locked during the following spins. In the bonus feature, the grid does not decrease in size.

Color Blast: if you get a group of 70 cubes of the same color during Free Spins, then a prize equal to 2,500 times the bet is paid.

Opinions on Cubes

The Hacksaw Gaming slot seemed really well done to us. The spins never caused sudden slowdowns or interruptions, despite the fairly dated pc we used. For those of us who love cluster games, Cubes can be a good product to spend enjoyable moments with. The medium volatility seems like a good compromise, you win with a good frequency and can receive significant amounts. The graphics are not excellent, but given the theme of the game, too many colors or animations would have just bothered us.

FAQ
Can I play Cubes on my mobile device?

This is exactly what the game has been optimized for! Hacksaw Gaming has created a series of slot games that are more suitable for playing on mobile devices. All you need is a stable internet connection and a compatible device.

Which features of the Cubes slot increase winnings?

Focus on the Color Blast feature, which has been configured to increase your winnings and make very profitable combinations.

How many paylines are there in Cubes?

The game does not have traditional paylines; a cluster-win format has been developed in a 5x5 cube, which can increase up to 11x11. Also try Cubes 2 for even more "brain-teasing" matches!

Review: Cubes

Raise your hand if you've ever tried to solve a Rubik's Cube at least once in your life. If you don't know what we're talking about, it's an invention that a Hungarian professor, Rubik, created in 1974. The six faces of the cube have different colors and are divided into squares that can rotate thanks to an internal mechanism. To play, you just need to turn the faces to mix up the squares and then try to restore the initial state, that is, one face = one color.

Cubes has a fairly minimalistic graphics, with a background made up of many cubes tending towards gray and in the center one of the faces of the cube. When you start the Spin, all the three-dimensional squares detach and rotate, landing with a different color. Some good animations follow the winning combinations and big wins. As for the musical component, the sounds are a mix of electronic effects that can be turned off at any time.

Slot Features

You win by associating 5 or more adjacent symbols in any point of the grid. The basic grid is 5x5, although each win involves the expansion of reels and rows. A first winning combination determines a 7x7 grid, then 9x9 and finally 11x11. With each expansion, of course, new colors are added that can give rise to new combinations. The grid returns to normal after each non-winning addition. Wins are paid after the last expansion.

The maximum prize is 3,000 times the bet, which starts from a minimum of 0.20 € to a maximum of 100 €. From the settings, you can activate automatic spins, turbo function, open the pay table and turn off the music.

Cubes has a medium volatility, meaning that the ratio between win frequency and amounts won is well balanced. The RTP value is 96.35%.

Symbols and Features

We have five different colors and win with a minimum of 5 symbols up to +25. The colors that are worth less are blue, purple, and light blue, while red, yellow, and green pay better.

Now let's look at the three special functions:

Central Multiplier: Each Spin has a variable central multiplier up to a maximum of x22, which means that if a cluster of the same color passes through the center, the entire win will be multiplied.

Free Spins: To get Free Spins, there must be five groups of different colors on the grid. In this case, you are rewarded with a maximum of 10 free spins and a random color is assigned that will remain locked during the following spins. In the bonus feature, the grid does not decrease in size.

Color Blast: if you get a group of 70 cubes of the same color during Free Spins, then a prize equal to 2,500 times the bet is paid.

Opinions on Cubes

The Hacksaw Gaming slot seemed really well done to us. The spins never caused sudden slowdowns or interruptions, despite the fairly dated pc we used. For those of us who love cluster games, Cubes can be a good product to spend enjoyable moments with. The medium volatility seems like a good compromise, you win with a good frequency and can receive significant amounts. The graphics are not excellent, but given the theme of the game, too many colors or animations would have just bothered us.

This is exactly what the game has been optimized for! Hacksaw Gaming has created a series of slot games that are more suitable for playing on mobile devices. All you need is a stable internet connection and a compatible device.

Focus on the Color Blast feature, which has been configured to increase your winnings and make very profitable combinations.

The game does not have traditional paylines; a cluster-win format has been developed in a 5x5 cube, which can increase up to 11x11. Also try Cubes 2 for even more "brain-teasing" matches!
